original_text: In those days there was no king in Israel. Everyone did what was right in his own eyes.
korean_text: 그 때에는 이스라엘에 왕이 없었으므로 사람마다 자기 소견에 옳은 대로 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: In those days there was no king in Israel.
Everyone did what was right in his own eyes.
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 자기 눈에 옳은 대로 행하였다.
